application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1: Prunus Kansan - 2 metre Crown reduction, 2: Beech- Fell, 3: Silver Birches x8 Fell, 4: Acacia - Fell,5: Hornbeam - 3 metre Crown reduction, 6: Acacias x8 - Fell, 7: Sycamores x2 and One Birch - Fell, 8: Thuja Plicata - Reduce height by 6 metres, 10: Beech - to reduce the height by 3 metres and reduce lateral limbs growing towards the property (No. 55/56) by 1 metre, 11: Salix Caprea and Portuguese Laurel - Fell, 12: Salix Caprea -  3 metre crown reduction.
decision_conditions: Any replacement trees which within a period of five years from planting are removed, die or become seriously damaged/diseased shall be replaced within the next planting season (Oct 1st to April 30th) with trees of similar amenity value.Any replacement planting should be carried out with due consideration for overhead and underground services, property boundaries, buildings and potential maintenance. The eventual size of a specimen and the nature of its rooting structure should also be taken into account when choosing where to plant, in order to achieve the best result for your site.Ten of the following will be suitable replacement species.a) Copper Beech (Fagus sylvatica f. purpurea), b) Beech (Fagus sylvatica), c) Norway maple 'Crimson King' (Acer platanoides 'Crimson King'), d) Manna ash (Fraxinus ornus), e) Judas tree (Cercis siliquastrum), f) Wild Cherry (Prunus avium), g) English Oak (Quercus robur).I have to warn you that if one of the above specified replacements is not planted by the end of the first planting season (Oct 1st to April 30th) following the proposed removals, a notice may be served under section 207 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). However, I trust that such action will not be necessary and I look forward to receiving your full cooperation in this matter. Please ensure that you inform the Council's Tree Officer (james.baker@kingston.gov.uk) with the provision of a photo once the replanting has taken place.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Kingston Hill - Designated in UDP 1998
